Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: 在游戏里查看玩家在FFLogs上的数据的插件。
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.0.4.2: Miscellaneous improvements.
- 2.0.4.3: Removed always display table setting to avoid crashes.
      A bit annoying to fix, if you really want the setting back, please open an issue on the GitHub repo.
